text: [Music]
Rob Ryman I was born in the Netherlands
my father comes from a poor labor family
he had to go to work when he was 14 a
self-made Man became Union Leader my
mother uh grew up in Indonesia which was
then a Dutch colony and spent uh the
years of uh the war in a prison uh or
Japanese Camp She
survived and um I was her first born so
I grew up basically in a a poor liberal
Catholic Family in the Netherlands
that's you know that's where I come
from oh when I was young I think it was
definitely my mother yes I mean she knew
about life right so I I I grew up in in
in in a family in which you know there
were some rules or some ideas the first
one was uh life in general is not funny
be aware of that secondly um accept the
fact that you have to take
responsibilities three um um and when
life is not funny but when you accept

don't compromise do what you have to do
um so you know with with those things
and then for my my parents who were
uneducated that the children could get
an education could go to university it
was their dream was their dream so when
I finally uh after a a very difficult
High School period which to took me
eight years normally is six years but it
took me eight years because I really
hated it um and finally managed to go to
a university I spent 10 years studying
and I still regret that it was only 10
years you know it could have been and
it was just 10 years of reading books
books books books books books and my an

Go you know and and you know trying to

and this this whole whole mindset which
now is known as the world of European

know I was questioning myself would I
become a secret agent probably
influenced by James Bond uh a

I think I started to study theology by
training I'm a theologian which I

real Theologian because my whole work
was basically focused on again you know
Thomas man and and and and and and that
and that whole uh uh uh world but I
two things a I grew up in this family of

to deal with everything she learned me

I have the feeling that the only thing I

he said you can always become a

huge
background and then I became so
